      • DB

        protected DB(java.lang.String server,
             int port,
             java.lang.String user,
             java.lang.String password,
             java.lang.String database)
        Class to interact with a MYSQl server
        Parameters:
        server - server to be connected
        port - server-port Default-MYSQL:3306
        user - user who wants to interact with server
        password - password of user
        database - database to be connected

      • isConnected

        protected boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        True if DB is connected to the server, False if DB is not connected to the server.
